actions.text: Make sure player sees title screen
Change text color where we cannot do so before startup

children.text: Show buy button if not purchased (deprecated)

parameters.width: ((CarChars.At(char_line, 0, carID) + (upgrade_tier = 0 ? 0 : CarChars.At(char_line, upgrade_tier + 1, carID))) - UpgradeBar.low_value) / (UpgradeBar.high_value - UpgradeBar.low_value) * 470 + 122

((CarChars.At(char_line, 0, carID) + (max_upgrade_tier = 0 ? 0 : CarChars.At(char_line, max_upgrade_tier + 1, carID))) - garage_bar_max.low_value) / (garage_bar_max.high_value - garage_bar_max.low_value) * 470 + 145

parameters.value: CarChars.At(2 * charUID + 2, CarOwnership.At(1, charUID, carUID) + 2, carUID)
CarChars.At(2 * charUID + 2, CarOwnership.At(1, charUID, carUID) + 2, carUID)
CarChars.At(2 * charUID + 1, 0, carUID) + CarChars.At(2 * charUID + 1, CarOwnership.At(1, charUID, carUID) + 1, carUID)

children.text: Not enough coins - function have returned 0
